narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Crocus Home Care LLC is a Home Health provider based in Staten Island, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $71.0M in Medicaid payments across 464K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $71.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
